thread.title: MPavilion: No building plans, no good, says V&A Museum director Martin Roth
thread.title_full: MPavilion: No building plans, no good, says V&A Museum director Martin Roth

title: MPavilion: No building plans, no good, says V&A Museum director Martin Roth
text:
MPavilion: No building plans, no good... MPavilion: No building plans, no good, says V&A Museum director Martin Roth 14 min ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
"Obviously, you're not a good museum director if you don't build": The director of Britain's Victoria and Albert Museum, Martin Roth. Photo: Thierry Bal The golden rule of success for the head of a cultural institution is simple, according to the director of Britain's Victoria and Albert Museum, Martin Roth.   Sydney Morning Herald.
